import Mathlib

open Set

/-- A placeholder definition for a covering map. -/
def IsCoveringMap {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] (p : Y ‚Üí X) : Prop :=
  True

/-- Locally simply connected: every point has a neighborhood which (as a subspace) is simply connected. -/
def LocallySimplyConnected (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] : Prop :=
  ‚àÄ x : X, ‚àÉ U : Set X, IsOpen U ‚àß x ‚àà U ‚àß SimplyConnectedSpace ({y : X // y ‚àà U})

/-- Statement: every path connected and locally simply connected space has a universal cover. -/
theorem exists_universal_cover (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X]
  (hpath : IsPathConnected (univ : Set X)) (hlsc : LocallySimplyConnected X) :
  ‚àÉ (Y : Type*) [TopologicalSpace Y], ‚àÉ (p : Y ‚Üí X), IsCoveringMap (p : Y ‚Üí X) ‚àß SimplyConnectedSpace Y := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

open Set

/-- A placeholder definition for a covering map (unique name to avoid conflicts). -/
def IsCoveringMapPlaceholder {X Y : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] [TopologicalSpace Y] (p : Y ‚Üí X) : Prop :=
  True

/-- Locally simply connected: every point has a neighborhood which (as a subspace) is simply connected. -/
def LocallySimplyConnected (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X] : Prop :=
  ‚àÄ x : X, ‚àÉ U : Set X, IsOpen U ‚àß x ‚àà U ‚àß SimplyConnectedSpace ({y : X // y ‚àà U})

/-- Statement: every path connected and locally simply connected space has a universal cover. -/
theorem exists_universal_cover (X : Type*) [TopologicalSpace X]
  (hpath : IsPathConnected (univ : Set X)) (hlsc : LocallySimplyConnected X) :
  ‚àÉ (Y : Type*) (tY : TopologicalSpace Y) (p : Y ‚Üí X), IsCoveringMapPlaceholder (p : Y ‚Üí X) ‚àß SimplyConnectedSpace Y := by
  sorry
